title: (Champion Idea) Nemythes - The Demon King
body:
Nemythes is a Rising Arch Demon, an AD caster type champion whom is capable of a transcending into a Mixed Damage AD Caster.
Nemythes has a rough beginning but pays off by scaling into a Huge Juggernaut if ahead.
He excels in both Dueling and teamfighting, as well as being capable of executing a weakened enemy with his Ultimate - Demon King: Soul Tear in teamfights with the help of his allies, or enemies not paying attention.

Positions Suitable for Nemythes would be Top, Mid, or Jungle.


**Passive: A Dark Rising**
- Enemies moving towards Nemythes are slowed by 10%
- At Level 6/11/16. Nemythes also gains an Aura that reduces nearby enemy Armor and MR by 10/15/20 + 10%.
- At Level 16, Enemies moving AWAY from him will also be slowed.
- Affects an area of 600 units.
- Fully Ranked abilities gain a Power UP.
	

**Q: Following Fear** 70/80/90/100/110 mp 15/14/13/12/11 sec
Creates an area of 200 Radius of dark energy while channelling for 3 seconds.
The Area follows where the mouse is, with a speed of 300/320/340/360/380 and up to 1000 units away from Nemythes.
Nemythes Can Move while channelling at 25% Reduced Speed but cannot Auto Attack.
Enemies inside cannot channel, gains Grievous Wounds, and take 30/40/50/60/70%AD + 20/50/80/110/140 Physical Damage every second and gains a stack of Horror.
Grievous wounds is lost 1.5s after exiting the area.

Upon reaching 3 stacks of horror, the enemy is rooted for .75 seconds and take an additional 80%AD + 40/80/120/160/200 Physical Damage.

**At Rank 5**, if the enemy is rooted, the damage is increased to 125%AD + 60/120/180/240/300 Physical Damage and root duration increased to 1.25 seconds.


**W: Dark Energy Burst**  90/100/110/120/130mp 24/22.75/21.5/20.25/19sec
Channels for up to 3 seconds. Folding his wings back, he gains a barrier that blocks 40/50/60/70/80% of all damage, storing them.
After the channel is complete, he will let out a huge burst of shadow energies to nearby enemies within 300 units.
Dealing 33% of Damage Mitigated + 60/75/90/105/120 Physical Damage.
The enemies are also slowed by a decaying slow of 20% over 4 seconds.

**At Rank 5**, Damage dealt is increased to 66% of Damage Mitigated, and will now Heal for 20% of the Damage dealt onto Champions, Large, and Epic Monsters.


**E: Claws Of Death** No Cooldown
Toggle to use 55/60/65/70/75MP

Basic attacks gains 125 range. 
Each Basic Attack lowers enemy AD and AP by 2/3/4/5/6, to a minimum of 1.
Each Basic Attack slows by 5%.
Each Basic Attack grants a stacking healing debuff of 5% for

Stacks 12 times. Each stack lasts for 3/4/5/6/7 seconds.

**At Rank 5**, Attacks also burns 3% Enemy Max HP over 5 seconds as Physical Damage.


**R: Demon King - Soul Tear. ** 160/130/100 sec 200/250/300 MP
Passive: Shadow Burn
Gains a stack of Shadow Burn for each UNIQUE Champion EXECUTED with Demon King - Soul Tear.
For each stack of Shadow Burn, 10% Of damage dealt by Nemythes ABILITIES will be dealt as MAGIC Damage instead.
For each stack of Shadow Burn, The Vortex gains 15% AD Scaling.

**At Rank 3**
Enemies who take damage from Nemythes Abilities will also take ANOTHER 10% of that damage taken over 2 seconds as TRUE DAMAGE.
Excluding Soul Tear.


**Active:**
First Cast - 
The Demon King rises into mid air, becoming untargetable for up to 6 seconds.

Second Cast -
Selects an area within 1500 range to channel, a vortex of 200 units then forms around his chosen location.
The Vortex forms over 2 seconds and erupts 1 second after the vortex completes forming.
All units hit by this vortex takes 125%AD + 200/300/400 True Damage.

Enemies standing in the Vortex below 10/15/20% MAX HP After the completion of the Formation will be marked for Soul Tear.
Upon Eruption, they are Suppressed, Rendered Untargetable by either side, and Dragged into the Vortex and EXECUTED disregarding their location, Targetability, or even if Invulnerable.

The Forming of the Vortex is completely visible to enemies.

Nemythes lands back on the ground .75s after the Vortex Explodes.

**At Rank 3**
The Formation duration is reduced to 1.5 seconds.

replies.body: The kit is waaaaaay too overloaded.

Isnt the ult a bit too hard to land, thats a 3.5 second timer where anyone can just walk out of a tiny 200 radius circle.
Shorten that a bit, overall seems solid
